column4: I have a dual boot Ubuntu Karmic/Windows 7 system.  From the Ubuntu side, I can mount the Windows partition and read files on my Windows machine.  Is there a way or third-party application that will let me read my Ubuntu-side from my Windows side?
theres some in the workd.. but no idea if any exist yet.
those tools may not support ext4 yet.. or they might now.. hard to tell
